org.ow2.proactive.authentication

Interface Authentication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Loggable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RMAuthentication, SchedulerAuthenticationInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationImpl, RMAuthenticationImpl

    public interface Authentication
extends Loggable, Serializable
    Authentication interface.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9.1

    • Method Summary

      Subject authenticate(Credentials cred)
      Performs login.
      String getHostURL()
      Return the URL of this Instance.
      String getJMXConnectorURL()

    • Method Detail

      • isActivated

        org.objectweb.proactive.core.util.wrapper.BooleanWrapper isActivated()
        Checks whether an authentication is activated or in other words is ready to authenticate users.
        Returns:
        true if it is activated.

      • getPublicKey

        PublicKey getPublicKey()
                throws LoginException
        Request this Authentication's public key for credentials encryption
        Returns:
        this Authentication's public key
        Throws:
        LoginException - the key could not be retrieved

      • getPrivateKey

        byte[] getPrivateKey()
              throws LoginException
        Request this Authentication's private key for credentials encryption
        Returns:
        this Authentication's private key
        Throws:
        LoginException - the key could not be retrieved

      • getJMXConnectorURL

        String getJMXConnectorURL()
                   throws JMException
        Return the JMX connector server URL used to contact this instance.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the JMX connector server URL
        Throws:
        JMException - if the JMX connector server could not be started

      • getJMXConnectorURL

        String getJMXConnectorURL(JMXTransportProtocol protocol)
                   throws JMException
        Returns the address of the JMX connector server depending on the specified protocol.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the JMX transport protocol
        Returns:
        the address of the anonymous connector server
        Throws:
        JMException - in case of boot sequence failure

      • getHostURL

        String getHostURL()
        Return the URL of this Instance. This URL must be used to contact this Instance.
        Returns:
        the URL of this Instance.

      • authenticate

        Subject authenticate(Credentials cred)
              throws LoginException
        Performs login.
        Parameters:
        cred - encrypted username and password
        Returns:
        the name of the user logged
        Throws:
        LoginException - if username or password is incorrect.
